duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform physical labor at highway and heavy construction projects, including operating hand and power tools.
Clean and prepare construction sites, dig trenches, set braces, erect scaffolding, and remove waste materials and debris.
Execute job deliverables according to customer specifications and contract requirements while promoting and monitoring the safety of team members.
Assist in installing pipes and drains, erect temporary structures, fill potholes, and use hand tools to cut and shape materials.
Ensure compliance with safety protocols and report any incidents or problems to the foreman.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent. Limited experience in Gas, Drilling, Overhead and Underground Power, or Solar/Electrical installation techniques and standards
